errors.notEnoughDetails: Please provide more details for your request
errors.insecureContext: This feature is only available in a secure context (HTTPS) in some or all supported browsers.

budget.donate: 🚨 OpenAI charges around $0.005 per answer. Please, re-charge the budget before/after using it. 🙏
budget.rewards: Also we have an alternative option - you can register on SCOIN rewards platform using our referral link and it will indirectly fund the budget over time.
